cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SP, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of signal recovery from noisy measurements, which is a common topic in information theory (cs.IT). The proposed algorithm is a modification of the Approximate Message Passing (AMP) algorithm, which is a popular method in machine learning (cs.LG) and signal processing (cs.SP). The paper also discusses the computational efficiency of the algorithm, which suggests a numerical analysis (cs.NA) perspective. Finally, the paper proposes a new approach to stabilizing AMP, which can be considered a contribution to the field of optimization (cs.SI).
